casebody.data:
The CITY OF CHARLOTTE
v.
UNIVERSITY FINANCIAL PROPERTIES, LLC, et al. 183PA16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 18, 2018 Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Nicolas E. Tosco, Attorneys at Law, Charles C. Meeker, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, DeWitt McCarley, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The City of Charlotte. Martin L. White, R. Susanne Todd, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, David V. Brennan, Attorney at Law, for University Financial Properties, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Joint Motion for Extension of Time to File Appellant Briefs filed on the 17th of December 2018:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of December 2018."
